uploader.tip: jpg/png files with a size less than 2480 x 3508 pixels

printing.title: PDF settings
printing.pages_to_include: Pages to include in your PDF:

landing.greetings_content_1: You want to become an artist? Welcome to Stains.by!
landing.greetings_content_2: All you have to do is to upload an image you want to paint. And after applying some magic you’ll get a palette and appropriate outline for your masterpiece.
landing.ideas: ...or scroll down, we have a couple of ideas for you...
landing.feature_interior: Self made pictures definitely look more pleasant than any photo. Don’t you?
landing.feature_gift: Sh… Sh… Don’t tell anyone! It’ll be our little secret… Making a gift is always a good idea ;)
landing.feature_gift_secondary: Not that good as this boy, but still...
landing.feature_rules: Life is too short to follow someone’s guides :) So have fun! Use any material of any color you have. Don't deny yourself anything!
landing.footer_1: By the way, we have an Instagram account!
landing.footer_2: We’re curious to see your artworks, so don’t forget to mark us.
landing.footer_3: All the news and also the best artworks will be posted there ;)
